org.grouplens.mooc.cbf

Class TFIDFItemScorer

    • Constructor Detail

      • TFIDFItemScorer

        @Inject
public TFIDFItemScorer(org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.UserEventDAO dao,
                      TFIDFModel m)
        Construct a new item scorer. LensKit's dependency injector will call this constructor and provide the appropriate parameters.
        Parameters:
        dao - The user-event DAO, so we can fetch a user's ratings when scoring items for them.
        m - The precomputed model containing the item tag vectors.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public void score(long user,
         @Nonnull
         org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.MutableSparseVector output)
        Generate item scores personalized for a particular user. For the TFIDF scorer, this will prepare a user profile and compare it to item tag vectors to produce the score.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to score for.
        output - The output vector. The contract of this method is that the caller creates a vector whose possible keys are all items that should be scored; this method fills in the scores.
